client

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.Client

  • public class Client
extends java.lang.Object

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  Client.GameState
      This enum provides all the possible states used by the Client.

      Stores the Player of the opponent.
      private boolean exitRequested
      If this variable is set to true it will break the while runtimeloop in the Client, leading to the termination of the client.

      Stores the Field object received by the server.

      Displayed when the first argument is illegal.

      Used to make a move when the player does not make his move in time, and to give hints.

      The state used to define the current state of the Client.

        Stores the Player of the local player.

      • enemy

        private Player enemy
        Stores the Player of the opponent.

      • exitRequested

        private boolean exitRequested
        If this variable is set to true it will break the while runtimeloop in the Client, leading to the termination of the client.

      • DEBUG

        public static final boolean DEBUG
        Variable used to set debug messages to visible or invisible. If debug == true, the debug messages are Visible. If debug == false, the debug messages are invisible.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        Contains the supported features of the Client.

        The state used to define the current state of the Client.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Client

        public Client(Player localPlayer,
              boolean wantGUI)
        Initialize the client.

    • Method Detail

      • runtimeLoop

        private void runtimeLoop()
        The main loop of the client. Handles communication with the Player and uses a Protocoller to communicate with the server.

      • welcomed

        protected void welcomed(int userID,
                        int millis,
                        int magicNumber)
        Sets the timeout time, the features of the game, the usedID of the Player.
        Parameters:
        userID - userID that was received by the server
        millis - the allowed time to respond to the server before
        magicNumber - an integer containing all the features of the game.

      • newGame

        protected void newGame(java.lang.String enemyName,
                       int enemyID,
                       int boardSizeX,
                       int boardSizeY,
                       int boardSizeZ,
                       int startingPlayer,
                       int winLength)
        starts a new game.
        Parameters:
        enemyName - Name of the enemy Player.
        enemyID - ID of the enemy Player.
        boardSizeX - length of the board in the x-dimension.
        boardSizeY - length of the board in the y-dimension.
        boardSizeZ - length of the board in the z-dimension.
        startingPlayer - the ID of the Player that will make the first move.
        winLength - specifies the length of chips needed to win the game.

      • chatReceived

        public void chatReceived(int sendId,
                         java.lang.String msg)
        Will display the received chat on the used View with the playerID or the user name of the opponent when the ID matches the ID of the opponent.
        Parameters:
        sendId - ID of the sending Player.
        msg - String containing the message that was send by the sending Player.

      • illegalCommand

        public void illegalCommand(java.lang.String input)
        Is called when an illegal move was made. Will display the input on the used View and will disconnect from the server if the Player is an instance of ComputerPlayer and the input contains the String move.
        Parameters:
        input - String containing the send illegal command.

      • opponentLeft

        public void opponentLeft(int enemyID,
                         java.lang.String string)
        Called when the enemy Player disconnects from the game.
        Parameters:
        enemyID - ID of the enemy Player
        string - message received when the opponent left the game.

      • gameOver

        public void gameOver(int id)
        Gives a message informing the Player whether the game ended in a win, loss or a tie.
        Parameters:
        id - The Id of the winning player.

      • receivedMove

        public void receivedMove(int x,
                         int y,
                         int moveId,
                         int nextId)
        Adds a chip to the field as received by the server.
        Parameters:
        x - location in the x-dimension of the field.
        y - location in the y-dimension of the field
        moveId - ID of the Player whom made the move.
        nextId - ID of the Player whom has to make the next move.

      • getView

        public View getView()
        Returns the view object of the client.
        Returns:
        view object of the client

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Closes the used Protocoller and terminates the client.

      • getProtocoller

        public Protocoller getProtocoller()
        Returns the Protocoller of the client.
        Returns:
        the Protocoller object of the client.

      • inGame

        public boolean inGame()
        Check if the client is currently in-game on the server.
        Returns:
        true if the client is in game, false otherwise.

      • setLocalPlayer

        public void setLocalPlayer(Player localPlayer)
        Set a reference to the client's Player object.
        Parameters:
        localPlayer - the player that this client represents.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
